actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for access to a certified nurse-midwife without prior referral in the Federal employee health benefits program.

summary.text: Entitles any individual covered by a Federal health benefits program which provides payment for the services of a nurse-midwife, to unrestricted selection of, and access to, such nurse-midwife.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for access to a certified nurse-midwife without prior referral in the Federal employee health benefits program.
